subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Unicode proposal again.
msgSnippet: ... That is, if anything, in favor of unification.  Estrangela, Western, and Eastern Syriac are unified partly because any given document is in only one of
messageBody:
Benct Philip Jonsson scripsit:

> Also people don't pick and choose among the Shavian or QS characters,
> but use either the one or the other system.

That is, if anything, in favor of unification. Estrangela, Western,
and Eastern Syriac are unified partly because any given document is in
only one of them, and so a mere font change does the right thing.

--
In politics, obedience and support John Cowan <cowan@...>
are the same thing. --Hannah Arendt http://www.ccil.org/~cowan

> Also people don't pick and choose among the Shavian or QS characters,
> but use either the one or the other system.

That is, if anything, in favor of unification.  Estrangela, Western,
and Eastern Syriac are unified partly because any given document is in
only one of them, and so a mere font change does the right thing.
